detailsData.title: Experienced Counsel
detailsData.content: Attorney Braid Pezzaglia has over 20 years of dedicated legal experience and provides legal counsel and guidance in five languages, including Japanese, Spanish, Chinese, and Tagalog. We work to customize your experience for your needs.

detailsData.title: Personalized Strategies
detailsData.content: Unlike other firms, our firm cares about instilling confidence in both you and your case. Our attorneys work one-on-one with you to ensure that your unique needs and goals are not only understood but obtained.

detailsData.title: Accountable & Transparent
detailsData.content: At the Law Offices of Braid Pezzaglia, we pride ourselves on always being available to our clients and we make it our main priority to keep you informed on how our team is working to obtain the best possible result on your behalf.

detailsData.title: Diverse Representation
detailsData.content: Braid Pezzaglia takes pride in the broad diversity of people, religions, and cultures he has represented. He recognizes that every person is worthy of dignity and respect, giving his clients a voice, no matter the adversity of the circumstances.

valueProp: With over 20 years of dedicated experience, our team has the tools, resources and knowledge to advocate on your behalf.

testimonalData.text: They are easy to talk with and are responsive. I feel like they have a genuine interest in their clients as people as well as the matters they work on. I highly recommend anyone to consult with Braid if they have an injury case to discuss.
testimonalData.author: Elwin Y.

testimonalData.text: I've dealt with different lawyers and Braid is the only one that genuinely listens and tries to help you out even if he isn't getting a job out of it. Hands down I wouldn't even consider anyone else.
testimonalData.author: David J.

testimonalData.text: Just the brief encounter and conversation I had with Braid he was getting the job done by asking the right questions and interested in assisting my situation. Attorney Braid you are one of the Best in Silicon Valley!
testimonalData.author: Sharon G.
